Sean Sam
Fiction & Nonfiction Editor

Sean Sam's writing has previously appeared in Déraciné, Potomac Review, Bird’s Thumb, and Red INK—among other places. He has work forthcoming in Salt Hill and ellipsis…literature and art. Find him online at www.seansam.com.
